snippet.title: Edengate: The Edge of Life - Announcement trailer [ESRB]
snippet.description:
Wishlist Edengate: The Edge of Life on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1414650/EDENGATE_The_Edge_of_Life

A gifted young scientist, Mia Lorenson, wakes up in an abandoned hospital full of questions— and precious few answers. What happened to her? What happened to the world?
Explore the deserted city of Edengate and follow the young scientist’s emotional journey as she searches for hope and solves the mystery of what happened to her... and the world. 

Features
🦠 Explore the desolate city of Edengate and unravel its mysteries.
🦠 Solve puzzles and overcome the obstacles in your path.
🦠 Experience Mia’s emotional journey accompanied by gripping voice-over performances.
🦠 With music from the acclaimed composer of Manifold Garden, immerse yourself in Edengate — a story about finding hope in the face of devastation, and what connects us to the world.

- - 
Join the HOOK Crew

Twitter: https://twitter.com/HOOKcrew 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HOOKcrew 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hookcrew_
